testcase.brief: Configure different items in walled garden which use default service
testcase.description: precondition: -Walled garden is supported by e-cwp currently Test procedure: 1:Configure different type items in walled garden and other relative e-CWP on ap, result 1 2:Client accesses different ip which are mapped to different type that configured in walled garden through http/https, result 2 3:Client passes authentication, then accesses different ip which are mapped to different type that configured in walled garden through http/https, result 2

step.desc: 1: Configure authentication type CWP (passthrough/e-cwp) on ap
step.ssh: -v "security-object auto-cwp" -v "security-object auto-cwp security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius2.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object auto-cwp security aaa radius-server accounting primary ${pub.radius2.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object auto-cwp security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal auth-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object auto-cwp web-server" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object auto-cwp" -v "security-object auto-cwp walled-garden hostname hztb-hm1.qaauto.aerohive.com" -v "security-object auto-cwp walled-garden ip-address 192.168.10.202" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile 1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "_debug auth all"

step.desc: open debug mode and clear log all
step.ssh: -v "_debug cgic basic" -v "_debug auth all" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "_ff dst-port 80" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: client request a web page and get the page from walled-garden'ip1
step.script: export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_login.py -r http://${sta1.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters login.is_permit=true visit.url=${url} visit.permit_url=${url1} login.username=${pub.radius1.username} login.password=${pub.radius1.passwd} -t ff -l info -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: clear auth r,clear auth l,clear auth s
step.ssh: -v "clear auth r" -v "clear auth l" -v "clear auth s"

step.desc: client request a web page and get the page from walled-garden'ip2
step.script: export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_login.py -r http://${sta1.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters login.is_permit=true visit.url=${url} visit.permit_url=${url2} login.username=${pub.radius1.username} login.password=${pub.radius1.passwd} -t ff -l info -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_access_Internet.py -r http://${sta1.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters login.is_success=true -t ff -l info -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
